title: Time And I
lyrics:
Time and I, I, I
Don't see eye to eye
Try as I might
It ain't no friend of mine
As I get older

Time rolls forward

Never slower

It ain't no friend of mine



Time and I, (ah, ahh ah, ahh ah, ahh ah-ah-ah-ah)

(Ah, ahh ah, ahh ah, ahh ah-ah-ah-ah)

Time and I, (ah, ahh ah, ahh ah, ahh ah-ah-ah-ah)

(Ah, ahh ah, ahh ah)

Don't see eye to eye (Aah ah-ah-ah-ah)



More I know

Quicker it goes

Losing hold

It ain't no friend of mine



With our history

Won't you please

Slow down for me

Or, at least try?



Time and I, (ah, ahh ah, ahh ah, ahh ah-ah-ah-ah)

(Ah, ahh ah, ahh ah, ahh ah ah-ah-ah-ah)

Time and I, (ah, ahh ah, ahh ah, ahh ah-ah-ah-ah)

(Ah, ahh ah, ahh ah, ahh ah-ah-ah-ah)



Days turn to weeks

And the years are laid in front of me

Sober to sweet

But not the way we used to be



Time and I, (ah, ahh ah, ahh ah, ahh ah-ah-ah-ah)

(Ah, ahh ah, ahh ah, ahh ah-ah-ah-ah)

Time and I, (ah, ahh ah, ahh ah, ahh ah-ah-ah-ah)

(Ah, ahh ah, ahh ah)

Don't see eye to eye (Aah ah-ah-ah-ah)



Ahh ah, ahh ah

Ahh ah, ahh ah

Ahh ah, ahh ah

Ahh ah, ahh ah



Ahh ah, ahh ah, ahh ah-ah-ah-ah

Ah, ahh ah, ahh ah, ahh ah-ah-ah-ah

Ah, ahh ah, ahh ah, ahh ah-ah-ah-ah

Ah, ahh ah, ahh ah, ahh ah-ah-ah-ah

Ah, ahh ah, ahh ah, ahh ah-ah-ah-ah

Ah

(Ah, ahh ah, ahh ah, ahh ah ah-ah-ah-ah)

(Ah, ahh ah, ahh ah, ahh ah-ah-ah-ah)

(Ah, ahh ah, ahh ah, ahh ah ah-ah-ah-ah)
